name: AMAZE (itch) (jejeremy) (jejeremy)
description:
AMAZE is an adventure/action game. In this game player controls a explorer in one big  black out maze.Player need to collect 4 gems to open the exit gate while roaming around the maze to also find the exit.

IT SO DARK INSIDE THE MAZE, THE ONLY LIGHT YOU HAVE IS WITHIN YOU.

-Controls :

1. Key Up  : Character go up

2. Key Down : Character go down

3. Key Left : Character go left

4. Key Right : Character go right

The 4 gems spread in the corner of the maze.You need to collect 4 gems before you can exit the game.

If you insist of going to the exits before collect all of the 4 gems, you'll be block by a invisible big rock. You need to collect the gems to destroy the invisible rock.

-Objective :

1.  Collect 4 gems that spread in the maze corners

2. Find The way out after collect all 4 gems

Be careful there's a lot of trap in this maze!

-Features:

1. There's traps around the maze, if you get close to the trap it will restart the game (the timer and the gems collected)

2. There's a gem icon that indicates how many gems you have collected

3.  There's Time indicator so can see how much time you need to exit the maze

4.  There is instructions menu in the main menu, YOU SHOULD CHECK IT FIRST  BEFORE YOU PLAY!

5. If you want to quit the game you can just click the (X) or exit button.

 Good luck Explorer!!!

And

Enjoy the game!
